def repartition(pw, wl, n):
    pw.sort()
    wl.sort()
    i, j, c = 0, 0, 0
    while i < n and j < n:
        if  pw[i] <= wl[j]:
            i += 1
            c += 1
        j += 1
    return c
 
t = int(raw_input())
for i in range(t):
    n  = int(raw_input())
    pw = map(int, raw_input().split())
    wl = map(int, raw_input().split())
    x  = repartition(pw, wl, n)
    print x
